class.name: GridMap
class.description: GridMap lets you place meshes on a grid interactively. It works both from the editor and can help you create in-game level editors. GridMaps use a [MeshLibrary] which contain a list of tiles: meshes with materials plus optional collisions and extra elements. A GridMap contains a collection of cells. Each grid cell refers to a [MeshLibrary] item. All cells in the map have the same dimensions. A GridMap is split into a sparse collection of octants for efficient rendering and physics processing. Every octant has the same dimensions and can contain several cells.

method.name: get_cell_item
method.description: The [MeshLibrary] item index located at the grid-based X, Y and Z coordinates. If the cell is empty, [INVALID_CELL_ITEM] will be returned.

method.name: get_cell_item_orientation
method.description: The orientation of the cell at the grid-based X, Y and Z coordinates. -1 is retuned if the cell is empty.

method.name: get_cell_size
method.description: The dimensions of the grid's cells.

method.name: get_center_x
method.description: Returns whether or not grid items are centered on the X axis.

method.name: get_center_y
method.description: Returns whether or not grid items are centered on the Y axis.

method.name: get_center_z
method.description: Returns whether or not grid items are centered on the Z axis.

method.name: get_meshes
method.description: Array of [Transform] and [Mesh] references corresponding to the non empty cells in the grid. The transforms are specified in world space.

method.name: get_octant_size
method.description: The size of each octant measured in number of cells. This applies to all three axis.

method.name: get_used_cells
method.description: Array of [Vector3] with the non empty cell coordinates in the grid map.

method.name: set_cell_item
method.description: Set the mesh index for the cell referenced by its grid-based X, Y and Z coordinates. A negative item index will clear the cell. Optionally, the item's orientation can be passed.

method.name: set_cell_size
method.description: Sets the height, width and depth of the grid's cells.

method.name: set_center_x
method.description: Set grid items to be centered on the X axis. By default it is enabled.

method.name: set_center_y
method.description: Set grid items to be centered on the Y axis. By default it is enabled.

method.name: set_center_z
method.description: Set grid items to be centered on the Z axis. By default it is enabled.

method.name: set_octant_size
method.description: Sets the size for each octant measured in number of cells. This applies to all three axis.

method.name: set_theme
method.description: Sets the collection of meshes for the map.

constants.constant: Invalid cell item that can be used in [method set_cell_item] to clear cells (or represent an empty cell in [method get_cell_item]).
